arts.ttl: Arne Slot provides Trent Alexander-Arnold Liverpool injury update amid Real Madrid concern
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot delivers an update on the injury that forced Trent Alexander-Arnold off the pitch in Saturday's 2-0 Premier League win over Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Vinicius Junior nets three and Jude Bellingham also on target in Real Madrid win
arts.sum: England international Bellingham’s goal was his first of the season.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid’s TRIPLE injury blow, Man City RECORD defeat, Chelsea’s Kepa LOSS
arts.sum: Real Madrid ’s transfer plans for January have changed after they were rocked by a fresh injury blow, Manchester City have slipped further off the Premier League pace behind Liverpool and Chelsea are bracing themselves for a huge loss. As a result, Real Madrid are set to make moves in the January transfer window, with Fabrizio Romano confirming their interest in Trent Alexander-Arnold of Liverpool and Castello Lukeba of RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Remarkable Vinícius > Mbappé stat surfaces after Real Madrid 4-0 Osasuna
arts.sum: A head-turning statistic has come to the fore, in the aftermath of Real Madrid’s victory over Osasuna. This comes after Vinícius Jr. enjoyed another outing to remember. Carlo Ancelotti’s troops…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid receive new €250m offer for Chelsea target
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior continues to be linked with a move away from Real Madrid, and the latest club that is prepared to give him the option to do so is Paris Saint-Germain. Since missing out on the 2024 Ballon d’Or award to Manchester City midfielder Rodri Hernandez, Vinicius’ future at the Santiago Bernabeu has been the […] The post Real Madrid receive new €250m offer for Chelsea target appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano transfer news: Real Madrid’s STRONG Trent play, Estevao HIJACK, Amad CONTRACT
arts.sum: Fabrizio Romano has provided the latest transfer news updates as Real Madrid face a long-term injury to Eder Militao, Chelsea get excited about Willian Estvao and Amad Diallo considers his Manchester United future. Fabrizio Romano transfer news: Real Madrid’s STRONG Trent play, Estevao HIJACK, Amad CONTRACT

arts.ttl: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick asks for reunion with Bayern Munich star, Real Madrid and Manchester United also keen
arts.sum: Alphonso Davies will be a player in demand in 2025, and Barcelona are one of the clubs plotting to take him away from Bayern Munich next summer. In recent weeks, Barcelona have expressed in-house doubts about the left-back position in Hansi Flick’s squad. Alejandro Balde has had a slightly underwhelming start to the 2024-25 season, […] The post Barcelona manager Hansi Flick asks for reunion with Bayern Munich star, Real Madrid and Manchester United also keen appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Arda Güler & Sergio Ramos lead messages of support to Real Madrid star Éder Militão
arts.sum: A whole host of Real Madrid stars have this evening taken to social media, to send messages of support the way of teammate Éder Militão. This, of course, comes fresh…

arts.ttl: Eder Militao shows the TRUE cost of Mbappe’s Real Madrid move
arts.sum: Real Madrid ’s decision to sign Kylian Mbappe in the summer continues to look worse with almost each passing day, with a serious injury to Eder Militao raising further questions over the transfer policy of president Florentino Perez. Indeed, it was the lavish investment in Mbappe that prevented the club from signing additional cover at centre-back, despite knowing David Alaba was in the midst of rehabilitation after a long-term injury and that they were already going to be a player down due to Nacho’s departure.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham finally ends Real Madrid goal drought with Osasuna strike
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham ended his 179 day goal drought after scoring a sublime strike against Osasuna during Saturday's 4-0 win.
